testcase.name: UIChanges-1
testcase.summary: Check the URL tab on the UI displays a new checkbox control for Enable URL filtering.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL filtering page should display a new checkbox control Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check the URL tab for changes.

testcase.name: UIChanges-2
testcase.summary: Check that the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions control on the page is functional.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The checbox control should be enabled. The user should be able to select /de-select the URL filtering option by clicking on the control.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions checkbox control on the URL tab.

testcase.name: UIChanges-3
testcase.summary: Check the URL tab on the UI displays a radio-button control for Enable Audit Mode

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL filtering page should display the control for Enable Audit Mode.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check that the URL tab displays radio button control for Enable Audit Mode.

testcase.name: UIChanges-4
testcase.summary: Check the URL tab on the UI displays a radio-button control for Enable Filtering Mode

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL filtering page should display the control for Enable Filtering Mode.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check that the URL tab displays radio button control for Enable Filtering Mode.

testcase.name: UIChanges-5
testcase.summary: Check that if the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions control on the page is disabled, all the controls on the page are disabled.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL filtering should be disabled.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
step.expectedresults: The control options for Enable Audit Mode and Enable Fitlering Mode should be disabled, as the URL filtering has been disabled.

step.actions: Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
step.expectedresults: By default, the option for Enable Filtering Mode should be selected.

step.actions: Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
step.expectedresults: All the controls on the page should be disabled.

step.actions: Un-Check the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions checkbox control on the URL tab.

testcase.name: UIChanges-6
testcase.summary: Check that if the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions control on the page is enabled, all the controls on the page are enabled.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL filtering should be enabled.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
step.expectedresults: The control options for Enable Audit Mode and Enable Fitlering Mode should be enabled, as the URL filtering has been enabled.

step.actions: Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
step.expectedresults: By default, the option for Enable Filtering Mode should be selected.

step.actions: Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
step.expectedresults: All the controls on the page should be enabled.

step.actions: Check/Select the Enable URL filtering and download of URL definitions checkbox control on the URL tab.

testcase.name: UIChanges-7
testcase.summary: Check that the section for Dynamic Document Review Filtering is not available on the UI.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The entire section for DDR Filtering should not be available on the page.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
step.expectedresults: The title Dynamic Document Review Filtering is not displayed.

step.actions: Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
step.expectedresults: The line separator under the title Dynamic Document Review Filtering is not displayed.

step.actions: Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
step.expectedresults: The checkbox option for Enable dynamic filtering is not displayed.

step.actions: Check that the section Dynamic Document Review Filtering is removed from the UI.
step.expectedresults: The option for Threshold for incoming data along with the threshold value drop down is not displayed.
The option for Threshold for outgoing data along with the threshold value drop down is not displayed.

testcase.name: UIChanges-8
testcase.summary: Check that the drop down for Locale is not available on the UI.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The drop down control option should be removed from the UI, as SSEv10 would not support multilple locales.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check that the drop down control for Category Locale under the section Configure Symantec Categories is removed from the UI.

testcase.name: UIChanges-9
testcase.summary: Check that the title Configure Symantec Categories should be updated.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The title of the section should be updated, as SSE v10 no longer integrates Symantec URL filtering and its categories.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check that the title for the section Configure Symantec Categories is updated.

testcase.name: UIChanges-10
testcase.summary: Check that there is only one text area under the section URL List Override

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The URL List Override section should now only display a single text box area.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
step.expectedresults: The ttiles Allow with DDR and Allow without DDR should be removed.

step.actions: Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check that the section URL List Override for controls.

testcase.name: UIChanges-11
testcase.summary: Check that all the <87> categories are displayed correctly under the Select Symantec Category section.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The list should display all the <87> categories along with a checkbox for each category. The user should be able to scroll up and down the list and select all the categories.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Check the category lists displayed under the section Configure Symantec Categories

testcase.name: UIChanges-12
testcase.summary: Check if the user is able to add a local category that is already present in the vendor category list.

step.actions: Install SSE 10 on Windows / Unix machine.
step.expectedresults: The user should NOT be able to add a duplicate category name as a Local Category.

step.actions: Install appropriate AV and URL license.
Open a new browser instance and enter the SSE UI url.
Navigate to the SSE UI -> Policies -> Filtering -> URL tab page.
Enter any existing catgeory name from the master category list into the Local Catgroy text area.
Save and Apply the settings and check behaviour.
